articles.title: How McKinsey Makes Its Own Rules
articles.description: The consulting company chases after government contracts, but it has a habit of evading the oversight that comes with them.
articles.content: McKinseys self-regard has long been uncommonly high. In the firms 2010 internal history, a copy of which ProPublica obtained, partners compare the firm to the Marine Corps, the Roman Catholic Church, and the Jesuits: analytically rigorous, deeply principled s… [+2370 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Belgian Carnival Removed From UNESCO List Over Anti-Semitic Imagery
articles.description: The Aalst carnival has been criticized for depicting Jews with sidecurls and oversize noses atop piles of money.
articles.content:
Belgian delegates at the UNESCO meeting declined to comment on Friday on the carnivals removal from the heritage list. But some of their European peers described it as a necessary decision.
We cannot allow these anti-Semitic manifestations to happen in Europ… [+1091 chars]
